verses.text: \w A|strong="H3588"\w* \w psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* David himself. \w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath reigned, let \w the|strong="H3588"\w* people \w be|strong="H3068"\w* angry: \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* sitteth \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* cherubims: let \w the|strong="H3588"\w* earth \w be|strong="H3068"\w* moved.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* great \w in|strong="H3068"\w* Sion, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w high|strong="H1471"\w* above \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w people|strong="H1471"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H2142"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w give|strong="H7200"\w* praise \w to|strong="H3478"\w* thy \w great|strong="H0430"\w* name: \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* terrible \w and|strong="H3478"\w* holy:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* kingâ€™s honour loveth judgment. Thou hast prepared directions: thou hast \w done|strong="H3605"\w* judgment \w and|strong="H3068"\w* justice \w in|strong="H3068"\w* Jacob.

Exalt ye \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* adore \w his|strong="H3068"\w* footstool, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* holy.

Moses \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Aaron among \w his|strong="H3068"\w* priests: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Samuel among \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* call upon \w his|strong="H3068"\w* name. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* called upon \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H6963"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*:

He spoke \w to|strong="H3220"\w* \w them|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* pillar \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* cloud. They kept \w his|strong="H3427"\w* testimonies, \w and|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* commandment \w which|strong="H4393"\w* he gave \w them|strong="H3427"\w*.

Thou didst hear \w them|strong="H3162"\w*, O Lord our God: thou wast \w a|strong="H2022"\w* merciful God \w to|strong="H2022"\w* \w them|strong="H3162"\w*, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* taking vengeance \w on|strong="H2022"\w* \w all|strong="H3162"\w* \w their|strong="H4222"\w* inventions.

Exalt ye \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* adore \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* holy mountain: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* holy.
